channel.title: Removing XTrap from a game - Possible?
channel.description: Does anyone at all know how to remove xtrap from a game or get around it I have been playing Knight Online lately (Yes horrible game I know - I PLAY IT BECAUSE I ENJOY ALL THE BUGS) Anyways it was working fine until I downloaded KOHACK which is a multi tool for the game with different options, anyways after I did that the client won't even run even when I have no instance of the hacktool left open and after I even deleted it...
